name: Petty Theft Moped: Terre Haute Stories
name_original: Petty Theft Moped: Terre Haute Stories
description: Terre Haute, Indiana may be described as the shining capital or the glowing radioactive cesspool of the Wabash Valley, depending on your viewpoint, but that doesn't stop people from needing ways to get around.  Mopeds are the perfect mode of transporation for this small city, or they are until they are stolen. Join our heorine and her party as she navigates unhelpful police officers, Meth  Heads, and faces the remnants of the KISS Army in her quest to recover her beloved moped, Pinkie Pi.  (Not a parody of Grand Theft Auto. Perhaps after the developer plays GTA she might parody it.)
